actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to increase the maximum loan amounts on certain programs, to revise the interest rate for certain loans, and to provide for congressional authorization of program levels.

summary.text: Authorizes a maximum loan amount for guaranteed real estate loans, under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act, of $225,000 or the value of the farm or security, whichever is less. Revises the interest rate for specified loans under such Act. Increases the maximum loan limitation and revises the interest rate for operating loans under such Act. Provides for congressional authorization of program levels under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to increase the maximum loan amounts on certain programs, to revise the interest rate for certain loans, and to provide for congressional authorization of program levels.
